original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 1 ||

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 2 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ

analyzed: viśvambhuḥ śrīkakutsaḥ sa ca kanakamuniḥ kāśyapaḥ śākyasiṃhaḥ

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 3 ||

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 4 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ
satyām tām yauvanāthaḥ nija vara bhuvanāt jyotiḥ ekam sasarja

original: ekāṃśaṃ pañca bhūtvā viharati satataṃ pañcabuddhātmako'sau
analyzed: eka aṃśam pañca bhūtvā viharati satatam pañca buddha ātmakaḥ usau

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 5 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ

original: yā prajñā guhyarūpā tridalakamalajā santu devaprasādā
analyzed: yā prajñā guhya rūpā tridala kamala jā santu deva prasādā

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 6 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ
maitrīya aṃśāt abhūt yaḥ vana mahat upare ratnacūḍa āsya ratnam
jyotiḥ saṃgamya bhavyam bhava jaladhi tarī ratnaliṅgeśvara ākhyaḥ

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 7 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ
trātum gokarṇa duṣṭam japasi dhṛta matim lokanātha ājñayā abhūt
padma ākāram khagañja abhidha jina tanayaḥ vāgmatīpūra tīre
śrī gokarṇa īśvaraḥ sa pitṛ jana hata kṛt vāgmatī saṃgame asmin

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 8 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ

original: kruddhaṃ nāgādhirājaṃ kulikasamavidhaṃ trāsayan kīlavad yo
analyzed: kruddham nāga adhirājam kulika samavidham trāsayan kīla vat yaḥ
lokānām bhadra hetoḥ gamana vat upari śrīgirau vīta rāgaḥ
śrī dhvaja kṛtiḥ abhavat kāli nāmā maheśaḥ

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 9 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ
pātum tam sarva pādam kamaladhara girā vajrapāṇiḥ jihīte
lokānām rakṣaṇa artham punar api kalaśa ākāra tā aṃśāt abhūt saḥ
śrīmān sarveśvara ākhyaḥ jina vara tanayaḥ daṇḍa śūlau dadhānaḥ

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 10 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ
durbodham mañju garta vyajana sukha ratam kaminī su prabodham
kṛtvā prājñam mahāntam kavi varam akarot mañjudevaḥ tatas api

original: śvāsaṃ saṃdhāya bhavyaṃ sakalaguṇapadaṃ prāpya garteśasaṃjñāḥ
analyzed: śvāsam saṃdhāya bhavyam sakala guṇa padam prāpya garteśa saṃjñāḥ

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 11 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ
matsya ākārābhiḥ āsīt sakalavaraṇaviṣkambhi nāmā su sattvaḥ
sa alaṅkāraḥ phaṇi indraiḥ adadat akhilakāt yoḍiya ākhyaḥ yayā asau
niṣkāśya āśam phaṇi indra īśvaraḥ iti samabhūt vīta rāga upya rāgaḥ

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 12 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ
sa śrīmān oḍiyāne sa ātapatraḥ su tīre
pṛthvīgarbha ākhya bauddhaḥ jhaṭiti tam sthāpayāmāsa vāsam
gandheśaḥ vīta rāgaḥ bhavat akhila suhṛd lokanātha agratasthaḥ

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 13 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ

original: śaṃkhaṃ dadhmau saharṣaḥ smaradamitasutaṃ vikramāt prāptasiddhiḥ
analyzed: śaṃkham dadhmau sa harṣaḥ smarat amita sutam vikramāt prāpta siddhiḥ
yasmāt loka īśvara ājñā vinihita harayaḥ prādurāsīt kha garbhaḥ
yaḥ sva āśam sthāpayitvā nija puram agamat vikrameśa abhidhānam

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 14 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ
nāgaḥ tārkṣyeṇa yasmāt alabhat anusukham puṇya nāmā sutīrthaḥ

original: pārvatyā yatra tepe kalahanivasane śāntatīrthaḥ praśāntaḥ |
analyzed: pārvatyāḥ yatra tepe kalaha nivasane śānta tīrthaḥ praśāntaḥ
taptam rudreṇa durga abhilaṣita manasā śaṅkara ākhyaḥ triveṇaḥ

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 15 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ
tīrthaḥ rāja abhidhānaḥ yat alabhat avanīpāla rājyam virūpaḥ
vyādhaḥ ca etaḥ ca yasmāt surapati sadanam prāgamat kāmatīrthaḥ
vajra ācāryeṇa paśyam yat abhiṣava kṛtaḥ saṃgamaḥ nirmala ākhyaḥ

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 16 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ
dīnaiḥ āptam nidhānam yat apaciti paraiḥ ākara ākhyaḥ hi
jñaiḥ labdham jñānam asmāt yat udaka matibhiḥ jñāna saṃjñā eka tīrthaḥ
cintāmaṇi ākhya tīrtha abhidha vat abhiṣavaiḥ yatra prāpta ubhilāṣaḥ

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 17 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ
yatra snātaiḥ mudā āpta iti samabhidham abhūt yaḥ ca prāmodatīrthaḥ

original: prādāt sallakṣaṇaṃ yaḥ svapayasi saratāṃ tīrthasallakṣaṇākhyaḥ |
analyzed: prādāt sat lakṣaṇam yaḥ sva payasi saratām tīrtha sat lakṣaṇa ākhyaḥ
yatra snātvā bala ākhyaḥ surapatiḥ ajayat dvīpam ākhyaṃbha tīrthaḥ

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhātāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 18 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhātām naumi aham tāḥ
brahmāṇī ādyāḥ ca devyaḥ

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 19 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ
vāgmatyāḥ mūlapuccha prabhṛtayaḥ upatīrthāḥ tathā keśacaityāḥ
śaṅkhocca sthāḥ ca jāta uccaya girilalitaḥ caityabhaṭṭāraka usau

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 20 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ
mañjuśrī parvata stha unucara viracitaḥ mañjuśobha ākhya caityaḥ
śānta śrī nirmiteṣu prakṛta vasatayaḥ pañca devāpureṣu
puccha agraḥ caitya varyaḥ abhyakathat anupamam yatra

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 21 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ
ādhāra ākhyaḥ hṛdisthaḥ sa gaṇa phaṇi patiḥ vidhna rāja antakaḥ ca
nāgaḥ ca ānanda loke hari hari harivāha ākhya trailokya vaṃśe
lokeśāya akṣama tvaḥ tadanu sa phala yāśā abhiloka eka nāthaḥ

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 22 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ
hevajraḥ saṃvarā usau sa parijana gaṇaḥ caṇḍavīraḥ trilokī
vīraḥ yogāmbarā usau yama nidhana kara ādyāḥ daśa kroḍha dharā jāḥ
guhyāḥ bāhyāḥ ca sarve parimita pramukhāḥ nāma saṃgīti vyākhyā

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 23 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ
śīrṣe prāgāt payaḥ asau sahita parijanaḥ candrasāhā usita adriḥ

original: chitvā śoṣe hrade'smin puravarakamalo lokavāsāḥ parasya |
analyzed: chitvā śoṣe hrade asmin puravara kamalaḥ loka vāsāḥ parasya

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 24 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ

original: saukhāvatyāśca vaṅgaṃ tadanu janahite potale prāgamad yaḥ
analyzed: saukhāvatyāḥ ca vaṅgam tadanu jana hite potale prāgamat yaḥ
śānta uvagrāha doṣe lalita pura varam prāviśan deva hūtaḥ
sa śrīmān vajrapāṇiḥ sa jaṭa dhara hayagrīva pārṣad gaṇa īśaḥ

original: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 25 ||
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacid api saratām tiṣṭhatām naumi aham tāḥ
śrī svayambhupurāṇa uddhṛtā kalyāṇa pañcaviṃśati stutiḥ
